programme.title: Gingrich and Roosevelt
programme.short_synopsis: Republicans have a majority in both houses of the Senate for the first time in 40 years.
programme.medium_synopsis: With a Republican majority in both houses of the Senate for the first time in 40 years, Cooke explores the parallels drawn between Newt Gingrich and President Roosevelt.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
